name: FlyBee !!!
description:
Fly Bee is a time-passing game with the aim of obtaining the highest possible score.The game is divided into 3 levels:

- the first (easier) which is exceeded upon reaching 30 points

- the second (slightly more complex) which is exceeded upon reaching 60 points

- the third (more complicated) that has no limits, if not your skill.

Leave your best scores in the comments below!
